Title: Cheeseburger Casserole - Dinner: 1/2 cup of uncooked long-grain white rice
1. Bring the 3 cups of water to a boil in a saucepan over medium heat.
2. Add a pinch of salt to the boiling water then gradually stir in the uncooked rice.
3. Reduce the heat to low and allow the rice to cook for approximately 10 minutes
4. Keep cooking until the rice is soft and all the water has been absorbed.
5. Serve the porridge hot with honey
Title: Scrambled Eggs with Cheese and Chives - Lunch
1. Crack the eggs into a medium-sized bowl and whisk until well-mixed.
2. Heat a medium-sized skillet on medium heat
3. Pour the egg mixture into the pan and allow to sit for about one minute.
4. When the edges of the egg are beginning to set
begin to scramble with a rubber spatula.

Title: Cheeseburger Casserole - Dinner: 5. Once the eggs are about halfway cooked
add the shredded cheese and chives.

Title: Cheeseburger Casserole - Dinner: 6. Continue to scramble until eggs are completely set and cheese is melted.
